title: It shall be the duty of the developer to take care of the licensed premises including day- to-day maintenance of the tenements allotted on rent and common areas
clause_text: It shall be the duty of the developer to take care of the licensed premises including day- to-day maintenance of the tenements allotted on rent and common areas. Common maintenance charges may be shared by the developer with the cooperative society, if any.
section: REGULATIONS RELATING TO REHABILITATION AND FREE SALE COMPONENTS â€“
